catentdesc.name: Hermitage Straight Leg Denim Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: These straight leg denim jeans are cool and casual for any of your outdoor activities. Created from rugged cotton twill textile and colored blue with indigo dye, the denim jeans is a timeless classic. With the comfort fit, they can be your live-in jeans.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Straight Cut Formal Pants
catentdesc.longdescription: These formal black pants are straight cut to display a slim and sleek form. Being wrinkle-free and stretchable, they are easy to maintain for daily office wear. Along with a short-sleeved white shirt and a striped vest, these pants make an ensemble for a perfect workday.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Black Skinny Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: These black skinny jeans are your typical Friday night outing wear. With fancy buttons in the front, they can be easily dressed up with high heels. Made from color denim, these jeans are the next best thing to blue denim jeans.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Wide-Legged Denim Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: Wide-legged and low-rise, this pair of denim jeans fit tight around your hips and flare out from the knee downwards. Capable of rugged use, these jeans are durable and stay on forever in your wardrobe. These jeans have a stonewashed look portraying a dash of style and elan.

catentdesc.name: Albini Scrape Washed Skinny Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: This classic blue skintight jeans is scrape washed for a faded effect. Made of stretch denim blend, these jeans appear extremely skinny and ruched at the ankles. The elastane component in the fabric enables the stretchable capacity in the jeans.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Black Flared Formal Pants
catentdesc.longdescription: Mid-rise and belted, these flared pants could be your fashionable office wear. In jet-black, these pants introduce a tummy trimming look. Paired with a formal white shirt, this outfit will be a suitable go for any formal occasion.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Black Tight Pants
catentdesc.longdescription: Suitable for a casual Friday at the office or for an evening out, this pair of pants hugs your leg comfortably. You can match them with a casual top or a sweater for a more formal look. The pleats around the waistband and the loose fit make it ideal as part of an outfit for a relaxed lounge time with friends.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Gray Gabardine Trousers
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gray gabardine trousers with bootcut leg
catentdesc.longdescription: These tall, gray mid-rise gabardines are sleek and professional for your regular office wear. The bootcut legs and styling adds to the curvy and fit look of the pants. Of soft and smooth fabric, these pants are comfortably wearable.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Brown Checked Trousers
catentdesc.longdescription: The cuffs around the slightly flared bootcut leg helps a taller and leaner look. The warm and earthy tone of these trousers add a pleasing touch. Paired with a matching top, this outfit constitutes business casuals.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Straight Leg Black Formal Pants
catentdesc.longdescription: These black formal pants can be your quintessential office pants. The straight cut presents a sleek and polished appearance. Pair it with a jacket and a shirt for a cutting-edge appearance.

catentdesc.name: Albini Beige Cotton Trousers
catentdesc.longdescription: This pair of slimming trousers is well-cut and form-fitting. These trousers are tapered to allow for a groomed look. Of cotton make, wear it with flats, boots, or stilettos for shopping or a cocktail evening.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Black Striped Pants
catentdesc.longdescription: These black striped flared pants look great as part of a business suit. They present a stylish and modern look. The vertical stripes add to the height and will make you look taller.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Straight Leg Stretch Pants
catentdesc.shortdescription: Straight leg slate gray stretch pants
catentdesc.longdescription: These straight leg stretch pants are smooth and durable. Flexible and in a slate gray with button closure and a zip fly, these pants can be worn with or without a belt. With a unique, taillored fit, these pants are fabulous for a leg-lengthening look.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Straight Leg Corduroy Pants
catentdesc.shortdescription: Straight leg pale gray corduroy pants
catentdesc.longdescription: These soft corduroy pants show a slim silhouette with a casual style. The rugged style and the two front pockets keep it utilitarian. These pants also have loops at the waist for a matching belt.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Pinstriped Trousers
catentdesc.longdescription: This narrow pair of pinstriped trousers display an elegant and stylish appearance. Slinky yet sophisticated, these pants are made of the lightest fabric and are general, all-purpose pants. The polyester blend material is longlasting and hard-wearing.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Blue Skinny Jeans
catentdesc.longdescription: This classic original skinny comes in denim blue. With a snug fit around the hip and legs, these jeans are for everyday use and can be teamed with any top or shirt. Created from rugged cotton twill textile and colored blue with indigo dye, the denim jeans is a timeless classic.
